```{r 01020103setup, include=FALSE}
## 01020103 Population variance from a table of absolute frequencies.
```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
## DATA GENERATION
signifDig <- 4

(k = sample(8:10, 1))

(values = c(sample(-10:20, k)))

(frequencies = c(sample(1:15, k)))

(data = rep(values, frequencies))

n = length(data)

(frecTableForQuestion = table(data))

## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION
(sol = (n - 1) * var(data) / n)

(sol = signif(sol, signifDig))
```


```{r eval=(language == "en"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
question=paste0("Given the set of unique values $$", paste0(names(frecTableForQuestion), collapse = ", "),"$$ and their absolute frequencies  $$", paste0(frecTableForQuestion, collapse = ", "),"$$ find the **population variance** of this data set.")

answer=paste0("The answer is ",
  sol
)

```


```{r eval=(language == "es"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}

answer=paste0("La respuesta es ", sol)
```
